Html:
Hi there,

how likely is it, that a AMS (American Mathematical Society) - style will be released?

Thanks,
Sietsch.

Rather unlikely ... at least by me.

You might try to do it yourself using the BibWord template or ask the AMS people to do it for you. I did check out their site and noticed they have BibTeX styles which might be a good starting point if you would do it yourself.

Yves
